message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
I think a fair split is best.  Do you agree?
I'll take a bit more, you can still get a good amount
How about we switch places from your first offer?  Seems fair to me.
I'll increase my share a bit more, think about it
Alice, it's getting late in the game. This is my final offer - take it or leave it.
You're being too greedy, I'll take more
Okay Alice, let's stop wasting time.  I'll accept your original offer.
